segments.text: I see the woman in her knee-length dress and apron, focused on polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her back is turned to the mess, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spills over the edge of the sink, cascading onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a mess waiting to happen, and she seems blissfully unaware of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming in from the window makes everything look so normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But it feels like a calm before the storm, with everything about to go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how much she trusts her children, letting them play without supervision.
segments.speaker: PAR
